result.arabic_text: قُل لَّا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ كَثۡرَةُ ٱلۡخَبِيثِۚ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
result.translation: 100. Nabiyow keenik ixxic: faxemiiy takkay umam kee meqem ma- massowta, Seehadaytow umaamih mangaa kee tet aba marih manga tassokoote way, toysa Qaafiyatah yan Kas-le Maraw Yallak meesita Jannatal taffoofeenimkeh.
